title: Peko Button
helpcontent: Click any button to play Pekora's lines~ No need to wait for the first line to finish before playing the next one.
additionalhelp: Volume warning. Each of the sound clips may have different volumes. Sorry but I'm not going to do anything about it ε=ε=ε=┏(゜ロ゜;)┛
developerinfo: This site is made by fans. We are not related to Hololive Official in any way.
credits: Special Thanks：野兔子同好会 Richard_Al 昭和歌姬夏半首 Qradn
tips1: Select any sound clips you want (duplication is allowed)
tips2: Then click this button in the bottom right corner
tips3: You can control the playlist here. It will play the clips in order peko.
entersomewords: Please enter the sentence you want to generate (please don't make it too long, it may lag)
addtohomescreen: Add Peko Button to home screen
addtohomescreeninfo: This site supports PWA. You can add this site to the home screen like normal apps and use it offline.
newversion: A brand new version is on the way
